Name: Lamia
Description: The capital of Phthiotis, known for its rich history and as a key city in central Greece.

Name: Stylida
Description: A coastal municipality located near the Gulf of Maliakos, with a blend of historical and natural beauty.

Name: Fthiotida
Description: A municipality known for its archaeological sites and connection to the ancient region of Fthiotis.

Name: Malesina
Description: A town in Phthiotis known for its proximity to the Gulf of Maliakos and its agricultural importance.
